We are so excited to be back educating our scholars! Thank you for being an amazing learning community.

#Mask up

As we embark on the beginning of the 20-21 school year, the SCCSD wishes to thank you for your trust in allowing our District to partner with you in the education of your student. We are so excited to be back educating our scholars! Thank you for being an amazing learning community.

#Mask up
#Stay 6ft apart
#Wash hands thoroughly

Morrilton High School will hold its traditional commencement ceremony on Thursday , July 23rd 7:00 p.m. at Devil Dog Arena.
A few reminders:
1. A person must have a ticket to enter. Each student graduating has been allotted 8 tickets. These can be picked up at the MHS front office before Thursday. When you pick up your tickets we will schedule a time for you and your family to enter Devil Dog Arena. Families of 8 are encouraged to sit together.
2. No one except the graduates and appropriate SCCSD staff are allowed on the arena floor at any time.
3. Persons attending will be asked to exit the arena after the ceremony.
4. All in attendance will be expected to wear a face covering.
5. Please practice social distancing as much as possible.
